tweet: Shame on you if you put money into @electroneum. They raised $40M before figuring out 0-fee txs create spam, decided to fork $XMR to solve.
@electroneum In a just world, a grey hat hacker would hack @electroneum's ICO address and market buy $XMR with the proceeds.
So as they raised $40M+ Electroneum will now "whitelabel" (open source) the already open-source forked $XMR code. @fluffypony  https://t.co/s9BnatDfo9
